title.rendered: Strengthening Recognition of Professional Qualifications in Kosovo!

content.rendered:
Today, at Europe House in Pristina, key institutions and stakeholders gathered for a Consultation Technical Workshop on Developing Procedures and Criteria for the Recognition of Professional Qualifications in alignment with EU Acquis on RPQ.
 
Experts from Romania and Lithuania shared their experiences and best practices, offering valuable insights on establishing clear recognition procedures.
Discussions focused on tailoring recommendations for Kosovo, ensuring a structured and efficient system for recognizing professional qualifications.
The event brought together representatives from MESTI, the State Council for Regulated Professions, key ministries, accreditation bodies, professional chambers, academia, and civil society to collaborate on this crucial reform.
 
This initiative funded by the European Union, is a step forward in enhancing professional mobility and aligning Kosovo with European standards.
 
Stay tuned for more updates on this important process!
